title: Love Is Not Black or White
description: In life weâ€™re taught on many levels as a child, student, worker and adult. But on each level we should have a more precise understanding about life and what to expect from it. The hidden truth of living life starts and ends with love. Although it's easy to spell, "LOVE" is not easy to digest when stipulations and circumstances exist. If you're not sure of what love is and how to demonstrate it when unjust, violence and selfishness are rapid; this book is for you. Providing real solutions to everyday problems at work, home or in society.
author: Mary  Wyatt
